mapper.select: SELECT y.* FROM(SELECT rownum as rm, x.* FROM (SELECT * FROM bookReview)x)y WHERE y.rm>=#{startRow} AND y.rm<=#{endRow}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookReview (reviewKeynum, userId, starNum, reviewContents, reviewDate) VALUES (key_num_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{starNum}, #{reviewContents}, SYSDATE)
